list.abs: 据澳大利亚《每日电讯报》2月10日报道，美国南达科他州奥格拉拉苏部落(Oglala Sioux Tribe)向内布拉斯加州地区法庭递交诉状，控 …

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Siouan people formerly inhabiting the Black Hills of western South Dakota
2. a Siouan language spoken by the Oglala people

auth_sentence.content: The Oglala aquifer is dropping rapidly because cities are being expanded in the desert and hay land is being irrigated.
